formElement.label: Knife Path:
formElement.documentation: Provide the path to the knife executable e.g /usr/bin/knife (This is the default value). (Required)

formElement.label: Configuration File:
formElement.documentation: Provide the path and name of the configuration file e.g /root/.chef/knife.rb (This is the default value). (Required)

formElement.label: Server URL:
formElement.documentation: Provide the URL of the Chef Server to use. (Required)

formElement.label: Cookbook Name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the cookbook to install. (Required)

formElement.label: Cookbook Version:
formElement.documentation: Provide the specific version to download. If left blank the latest version will be downloaded.

formElement.label: No Dependencies:
formElement.documentation: If checked cookbooks dependencies will not be installed automatically.

formElement.label: Verbose:
formElement.documentation: If checked a more verbose output is showed.

formElement.label: Cookbooks Path:
formElement.documentation: Provide the path where to install the cookbook. is suggested to use the path where all cookbooks are stored e.g /etc/chef/cookbooks (This is the default value).

formElement.label: Branch To Work With:
formElement.documentation: Provide the default branch to work with [ defaults to master ].
